Event.Name: OnLeftClick
Event.Desc: Fires when the left mouse button is clicked in the client area of the control.

Arg.Name: CheckBox
Arg.Desc: Handle of the control that fires this event.

Arg.Name: Checked
Arg.Desc: The checked state of the checkbox control.

Item.Name: true
Item.Desc: The checkbox is in checked state.

Item.Name: false
Item.Desc: The checkbox is in unchecked state.

Return.Desc: No return value expected for this event.
